name: Wink
description:
Here's an early demo of Wink!

You play as an eye guy who lives in a strange world filled with weird animals, plants and other things.

You can explore to find hidden and collectible items while trying to find a way to turn off the oil spill that has prevented you and your friends from traveling East.

Wink is a 2D platformer with lots of metroidvania and RPG elements.

I was inspired by my favorite games, like Mario 3, Zelda: Link's Awakening, and Yoshi's Island

The graphics are somewhere between an 8-bit and 16-bit style

This is an early release, so PLEASE contact me with any issues. Wink should run at a smooth 60fps at all times. As far as I know, there are no fatal errors.
